dmca.body:

Subject: RE: [0C6-0BE5035B-739B] DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers bigdealtv.com Sony
0809

________________________________

From: Legal Response [mailto:Legal-Response@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, May 04, 2006 11:27 AM
To: jayme@netenforcers.com
Subject: FW: [0C6-0BE5035B-739B] DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers bigdealtv.com Sony
0809

 

Jayme,

 

Please provide us with every URL, which is infringing upon Sony's copyright.

 

Thank you,

Legal Response Team

 

________________________________

From: Jayme [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, May 04, 2006 9:53 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: [0C6-0BE5035B-739B] DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers bigdealtv.com
Sony 0809
Subject: RE: [0C6-0BE5035B-739B] DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers bigdealtv.com Sony
0809

To whom it may concern, 

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter and your expeditious action thus far. I
have had your website rechecked and it appears that although you have removed the
images from the representative list provided you are required to remove all Sony TV
copyrighted images from your entire website in order to be in full compliance. If
you know the images we are referring to then please remove those as well, if you
have any confusion of which images we are referring to specifically then please let
me know and I will do my best to provide you with every url that would need to be
removed. 

 

 

________________________________

From: legal-response@theplanet.com
Sent: Fri, 28 Apr 2006 16:46:19 -0400
To: Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com;, misha@netenforcers.com,
copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers bigdealtv.com Sony 0809

To Whom It May Concern:



This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your below-pasted
complaint has been disabled.



Legal Response Team

The Planet




---------


From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of The Planet
Policy Enforcement

Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2006 11:25 AM

To: Jayme; copyright@theplanet.com

Subject: Re: [ABUSE] bigdealtv.com-Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)



-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----

Hash: SHA1



Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the address
of copyright@theplanet.com.



- --

Thanks,



Policy Enforcement

The Planet Internet Services, Inc.

http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html





Jayme wrote:

> 

> 

> 

> * April 18, 2006 *

> 

> * SENT VIA Certified Mail

> Return Receipt Requested *

> 

> 

> 

> * 7006 0100 0002 0690 0809 *

> 

> 

> 

> * *

> 

> * Designated Agent *

> 

> * Theplanet.com *

> 

> * *

> 

> 

> 

> */ Re: Unauthorized Use of Sony Trademarks and/or Copyrighted

> Materials /*

> 

> 

> 

> Dear Designated Agent:

> 

> 

> 

> We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact 

> you with respect to unauthorized use of Sony?s trademarks and/or 

> copyrighted materials.

> 

> 

> 

> Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and 

> enforcement of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, 

> and other copyrighted materials. Net Enforcers has in turn retained 

> us to assist with this matter. Pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
